# nxos_features (Data Source)

This data source can read the feature configuration on NX-OS devices, including the administrative state of features such as BGP, OSPF, PIM, EVPN, LACP, vPC, and others.

- API Documentation: [fmEntity](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-5-3/docs/Feature%20Management/fm:Entity/)

### Additional API Documentation

- [fmBashShell](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-5-3/docs/Feature%20Management/fm:BashShell/)

- [fmBgp](https://pubhub.devnetcloud.com/media/dme-docs-10-5-3/docs/Feature%20Management/fm:Bgp/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "nxos_features" "example" {
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `bash_shell` (String) Administrative state.
- `bfd` (String) Administrative state.
- `bgp` (String) Administrative state.
- `dhcp` (String) Administrative state.
- `evpn` (String) Administrative state.
- `hmm` (String) Administrative state.
- `hsrp` (String) Administrative state.

- `interface_vlan` (String) Administrative state.

- `lacp` (String) Administrative state.

- `ospfv3` (String) Administrative state.

- `ptp` (String) Administrative state.
- `pvlan` (String) Administrative state.
- `sflow` (String) Administrative state.
- `ssh` (String) Administrative state.
- `tacacs` (String) Administrative state.
